description: PersistentVolume (PV) is a storage resource provisioned by an administrator. It is analogous to a node. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/persistent-volumes

status.description: Status represents the current information/status for the persistent volume. Populated by the system. Read-only. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/persistent-volumes#persistent-volumes

spec.description: Spec defines a specification of a persistent volume owned by the cluster. Provisioned by an administrator. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/persistent-volumes#persistent-volumes
